element.name: buckaroo_creditcard_handling
element.label: Creditcard methode
Creditcard method
Creditcard methode
element.description: Check with Buckaroo whether Client Side Encryption is enabled, otherwise transactions will fail. If in doubt, please contact us.
Controleer bij Buckaroo of Client Side Encryption is ingeschakeld, anders mislukken transacties. Bij twijfel, neem contact met ons op.
